content: this beanie makes a good present for friends and family to keep warm this winter it can be made in any other color this chunky hat works up fast and is fun to make no seaming is needed it is a bottom up hat with ribbing with an option for adding pompom this hat is a part of the white winter set- free pattern is available on my website for all 3- matching hat leg warmers and wrist warmers click here to get white winter set free ebook 1 *skill level easy beginner friendly finished size- s m l for adults with head circumference 20 22 and 24 yarn any chunky or bulky or weight 5 yarn of choice can be used suggested yarn lion brand hue + me/ lion brand jiffy/ gentle yarn by big twist i have used a local yarn which is 100% acrylic yardage 145 m/ 158 yards in 100/ 3 5 oz of yarn each skein has 100 g approx amount needed 64 75 88 g or 101 119 138 yards more or less may be needed depending on alterations made to fit this is without pompom crochet hook 6 mm or j size hook adjust size to match gauge notions tapestry needle scissors measuring tape gauge single_crochet ribbing 12 single_crochet and 12 row= 4 or 10 cm *pattern details 1 the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english this is a 7 page pdf pattern 2 it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern row by row and round by round 3 it does not include finished product 4 it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook 5 a youtube tutorial is available and linked in pattern *permissions/ copyright all pictures and patterns are copyright to lets all crochet © do not use pictures or patterns for resale purposes the pattern cannot be shared altered or copied in any form and the pattern cannot be altered and claimed as own please feel free to sell your finished items on a small scale but use of your own photos is required while selling finished items credit given to lets all crochet is appreciated thank you so much for visiting get the free white winter set pdf here
